vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἤρ (L, Ἥρ), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. עֵר),
Er, an ancestor of Jesus: Luk.3:28.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.28;
son of: Joshua (G2424K);
father of: Elmadam (G1678)
§ Er, "watcher, watchful"
Er, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:28*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
珥 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "注意的,警戒的,警醒的 "
約細的兒子,以摩當的父親 (路 3:28)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
珥 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "注意的,警戒的,警醒的 "
约细的儿子,以摩当的父亲 (路 3:28)
